name: Delightfully Exotic Mango Cake
author: LIV6
summary: This moist cake is deliciously sweetened with mango pulp with a moist texture. Simply amazing and super easy!
ingredients: 1 ½ cups canned sweetened mango pulp
2 tablespoons whole almonds, or as desired  (Optional)
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Beat mango pulp, sugar, margarine, and eggs together in a bowl using an electric mixer on medium speed until light and well mixed, 3 to 5 minutes
Sift flour, baking powder, and baking soda together in a bowl
Stir mango mixture into flour mixture just until batter is combined
Pour batter into the prepared baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes
Continue baking until a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean, about 20 minutes
